message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $900,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750,000. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $750,000 is significantly below my minimum.  I'm willing to compromise a bit,  how about $850,000?  This price still leaves some room for you to profit while ensuring I receive a fair value for the product.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $850,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $775,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from the product.
